column1: Another Twitter comment: “Gonna be some dead social workers in the future.” Yes. It is remarkable that in some places like the City of Minneapolis near where I live public officials are moving forward with plans to replace police officers wholly or in part with ill-defined employees who presumably will turn out to be social workers.  Commenters who employ what we deem extreme vulgarity in a comment — “s***” “f***” “a*******” or one of their many variants — will be banned without further notice.  “Arise and take our stand for freedom as in the olden time.”
